prompt: <description>Part 1 Instructions Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. 1. Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the created coordinate system. 3. Divide the sketch into a single face (face_1). 4. Create a loop (loop_1) on face_1 consisting of 4 line segments with the following properties: * line_1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.125, 0.0] * line_2: Start Point [0.125, 0.0], End Point [0.125, 0.0417] * line_3: Start Point [0.125, 0.0417], End Point [0.0, 0.0417] * line_4: Start Point [0.0, 0.0417], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Part 2 Instructions Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.75] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the created coordinate system. 3. Divide the sketch into a single face (face_1). 4. Create a loop (loop_1) on face_1 consisting of 5 line segments with the following properties: * line_1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.0417, 0.0] * line_2: Start Point [0.0417, 0.0], End Point [0.0417, 0.0417] * line_3: Start Point [0.0417, 0.0417], End Point [0.0417, 0.125] * line_4: Start Point [0.0417, 0.125], End Point [0.0, 0.125] * line_5: Start Point [0.0, 0.125], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Final Shape Combine both parts to create the final shape, which is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The dimensions are approximately 10 units long, 5 units wide, and 2 units tall. The side is curved with a radius of 1 unit.</description>
